column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |    1    |    2    |    3    |    4    |    5    |
| music-genre  |         |         |         |         |         |
| birthday |         |         |         |         |         |
| pet  |         |         |         |         |         |
| beverage |         |         |         |         |         |
| job  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 

The people prefer 5 different music-genres: indie, country, metal, salsa, soul
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: april, june, december, july, september
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
The people have 5 different jobs:  teacher, photographer, musician, police-officer, paramedic
5 different pets are kept: cat, bird, dog, fish, horse
1. the person who's birthday is in april is the fan of metal
2. the person who's birthday is in september is the owner of the dog
3. the person who's birthday is in june is the person drinking tea
4. the fan of country is on the left of the fan of salsa
5. the fan of country is the person drinking coffee
6. the musician is the owner of the bird
7. the fan of soul is the photographer
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the person who's birthday is in july is on the far left
10. the paramedic is on the left or right of the owner of the cat
11. the owner of the horses is on the left or right of the photographer
12. the teacher is the person drinking beer
13. the person who's birthday is in december is the police-officer
14. the person who's birthday is in july is on the left or right of the fan of indie
15. the paramedic is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
